sections.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Understand citizenship eligibility, required documents, and submission steps.

sections.title: Common naturalisation pathways
paragraphs: Eligibility checks, residency proof, and documentation support.
Guidance for special cases and accelerated eligibility routes.
Support for reacquisition or renouncing citizenship when needed.

sections.title: Ready for citizenship planning?
paragraphs: We’ll confirm eligibility and next steps for your case.

sections.title: Quick guide
paragraphs: Use this summary to understand eligibility, documentation, and typical timelines. We recommend confirming your exact requirements with a tailored consultation.
Confirm your visa or residency pathway.
Plan for translations, notarizations, and appointments.
